query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		createcvss3point0severitypayload {
			clientMutationId,
			errors(first:5) {
				edges {
					node {
						error_code,
						field,
						id,
						message,
						type,
					},
				},
				nodes {
					error_code,
					field,
					id,
					message,
					type,
				},
				total_count,
			},
			severity {
				_id,
				attack_complexity,
				attack_vector,
				author_type,
				availability,
				availability_requirement,
				calculation_method,
				confidentiality,
				confidentiality_requirement,
				created_at,
				cvss_vector_string,
				id,
				integrity,
				integrity_requirement,
				max_severity,
				privileges_required,
				rating,
				report_id,
				scope,
				score,
				score_by_rating,
				team_id,
				user_id,
				user_interaction,
			},
			was_successful,
		}
	}
